cause.description:
For those of you who join/support this cause understand that the FDA has been deceiving us and lying to us about how to stay healthy. They have tried to coverup cures to many known diseases such as cancer and diabetes for there own selfish gains.
This cause isnt necessarily about raising the most money, (although all money donated will be given to the AAHF) but if you support this cause you are stating that when oppurtunities arise to combat the FDA corruption you will do what you can to help. You also will help those with diseases by teaching them of alternative treatments or unorthodox treatments. You will educate the public/friends/family of the FDA's secrets, and of alternative ways of medicine.
1. Repair the FDA(if possible) otherwise dismantle and recreate new organization
2. Bring knowledge of alternative treatments to the entire U.S.
cause.mission: remove corruption from standing in the way of our public health
cause.name: Dismantle or repair the FDA!
